text: B.K. Krishnaraj Vanavarayar (second left), Chairman, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Coimbatore Kendra, conferring the title ‘Sangeeth Samrat’ on Pappu Venugopala Rao (third right), Secretary, The Music Academy, Chennai, and presenting ‘Kovai Subri Muruga Gana Award’ to Mohana Krishnan (second right), founder, Sri Kamakshi Music Group, Coimbatore, during the Bhavan’s 21st Pongal Music Festival in Coimbatore on Wednesday. —Photo: M. Periasamy
title: TAMIL NADU
